H1.text: what book did benjamin franklin published. Poor Richard's Almanack

H2.text: what book did benjamin franklin published. The Way to Wealth

H3.text: what book did benjamin franklin published. Address

A4.text: The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin was published by Charles E. Merrill Co. in 1892.

A5.text: The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin: Poor Richard's Almanac and other papers was published by A. L. Burt Co. in 1900.

A6.text: Poor Richard's Almanack was a yearly almanac published by Benjamin Franklin, who adopted the pseudonym of 'Poor Richard' or 'Richard Saunders' for this purpose.

A7.text: This was later published as The Way to Wealth, and was popular in both America and England.
